content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”We change everything WordPress. One WP theme at a time.” style=”three” font_size=”32px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Please have a look at our free WordPress themes. We have made sure that these themes are highly customizable and have their premium look and feel.

These themes are not just to be showcased, you can also download them and use for your free and commercial websites.  We don’t charge for these themes, but we would appreciate if you would leave a link back to our website. This is not asking a lot, and we are sure you will be OK with our request.

If you get stuck with setup and customization, we are here to help, and we try to answer every question on our support forum. For any special requests, please leave a note on the forum and we will respond quickly. This section will be updated as more themes become available.

Page last updated: December 2020[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row border_style=”solid” margin_top=”30px” margin_bottom=”50px”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”48604″ link=”https://colorlib.com/wp/themes/illdy/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”35763″ onclick=”custom_link” img_hover=”grow” title=”Activello – Simple Blog Theme” link=”https://colorlib.com/wp/themes/pixova-lite/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row border_style=”solid” margin_top=”30px” margin_bottom=”50px”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”99969″
